displayName.text: Clarel Antoine, MD - Compassionate Ob/Gyn Care

formattedAddress: 302 E 30th St Ground Floor, New York, NY 10016, USA
adrFormatAddress: 302 E 30th St Ground Floor, New York, NY 10016-8362, USA

originalText.text:
We've been patients of Dr. Antoine since 2020. Couldn't be happier!
Extremely caring and professional. Shout out to Peggy Jessica and the rest of the wonderful staff. Would highly recommend!

text.text:

Extremely caring and professional. Shout out to Peggy Jessica and the rest of the wonderful staff. Would highly recommend!

originalText.text: Dr. Clarel Antoine is the most gentle, warm human being and physician we have had the  pleasure to meet.

text.text: Dr. Clarel Antoine is the most gentle, warm human being and physician we have had the  pleasure to meet.

originalText.text: Dr. Antoine and his team are amazing. His staff is undeniably friendly and meticulous. Dr. Antoine is very professional and gentle. From the earliest moments in my pregnancy through to my labor, he has made me feel comfortable throughout. I had a wonderful experience with his office. Highly recommended!

text.text: Dr. Antoine and his team are amazing. His staff is undeniably friendly and meticulous. Dr. Antoine is very professional and gentle. From the earliest moments in my pregnancy through to my labor, he has made me feel comfortable throughout. I had a wonderful experience with his office. Highly recommended!

originalText.text: Dr. Antoine and his staff are simply incomparable. I've been in Dr. Antoine's care since my son's birth 18 yrs ago. All my pregnancies were complex and three ended in miscarriage. Dr. Antoine always made my husband and I feel as if we were his only patients. He took time to listen to our concerns and took time to ease our fears. Now, as I enter perimenopause, my body again has it's ups and downs. Dr. Antoine and staff again have been at my side as I navigate my hormone changes. There has never been a moment they have not listened to my frustrations and nurtured me toward treatments.  Simply, Dr. Antoine is THE BEST.

text.text: Dr. Antoine and his staff are simply incomparable. I've been in Dr. Antoine's care since my son's birth 18 yrs ago. All my pregnancies were complex and three ended in miscarriage. Dr. Antoine always made my husband and I feel as if we were his only patients. He took time to listen to our concerns and took time to ease our fears. Now, as I enter perimenopause, my body again has it's ups and downs. Dr. Antoine and staff again have been at my side as I navigate my hormone changes. There has never been a moment they have not listened to my frustrations and nurtured me toward treatments.  Simply, Dr. Antoine is THE BEST.

originalText.text: There are truly no words to express the depth of love and gratitude my husband and I have for Dr. Antoine and every member of his staff!! Dr. Antoine delivered my husband, his sibling and cousins so Dr. Antoine is very well known within my husband's family. Before meeting with Dr. Antoine, we were faced with one negative outcome over another, doors slamming in our faces and medical professionals instructing us to give up on our dreams of being biological parents. We never lost faith and decided to finally fly to NY and sit with Dr. Antoine. It was one of the best decisions we made. Once stepping into his office, you can feel the positivity and peace envelope you. My husband and I wept tears of joy after our appointment as Dr. Antoine renewed our hope in realizing our dream! A couple of weeks later, Dr. Antoine performed an open myomectamy removing the massive obstacles within me all the while preserving my womb. He created an opportunity for my husband and I that will never be forgotten. Him and every member of his staff remain in our prayers indefinitely. We are forever grateful!! God blessed us the day we met with Dr. Antoine and every day since. May God continue to bless Dr. Antoine and his amazing and caring staff.
